hero.title: Empowering Education in Georgia
hero.subtitle: We are dedicated to advancing educational excellence, fostering innovation, and building a brighter future for Georgia's youth through comprehensive programs, research, and community engagement.

featuredProjects.title: Featured Projects
featuredProjects.subtitle: Discover our innovative initiatives that are transforming education across Georgia

projects.title: Digital Literacy Program
projects.description: Empowering rural communities with essential digital skills and computer literacy training.

projects.title: Teacher Development Initiative
projects.description: Comprehensive training programs for educators to enhance teaching methodologies and student engagement.

projects.title: STEM Education for Youth
projects.description: Inspiring the next generation of innovators through hands-on science, technology, engineering, and mathematics programs.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform education in Georgia by providing innovative learning opportunities, supporting educators, and fostering a culture of academic excellence that empowers students to reach their full potential.

cta.title: Join Us in Building a Better Future

hero.title: About Georgian Education Initiative
hero.subtitle: Empowering the future of Georgia through innovative education and community engagement since 2009.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To transform education in Georgia by providing innovative learning opportunities, supporting educators, and fostering a culture of academic excellence that empowers students to reach their full potential and become active contributors to society.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading educational organization in Georgia, recognized for excellence in innovative teaching methodologies, comprehensive student support, and meaningful community engagement that creates lasting positive impact.

journey.title: Our Journey
journey.subtitle: Fifteen years of dedication to educational excellence and community impact

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The principles that guide everything we do

impact.title: Our Impact
impact.subtitle: Numbers that tell the story of our commitment to education

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: Our dedicated team of educators, researchers, and community leaders work together to create meaningful change in Georgia's educational landscape.

timeline.title: Foundation
timeline.description: Georgian Education Initiative was established with a vision to transform education in Georgia.

timeline.title: First Major Project
timeline.description: Launched our flagship Digital Literacy Program reaching 50 rural schools.

timeline.title: National Recognition
timeline.description: Received the National Education Excellence Award for innovative teaching methods.

timeline.title: International Partnerships
timeline.description: Established partnerships with leading educational institutions across Europe.

timeline.title: Digital Transformation
timeline.description: Pioneered comprehensive online learning platforms during the pandemic.

timeline.title: Future Forward
timeline.description: Expanding our reach to serve over 10,000 students across Georgia.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We embrace new technologies and methodologies to enhance educational outcomes.

values.title: Collaboration
values.description: We believe in the power of partnerships and working together with communities.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We strive for the highest quality in all our programs and initiatives.

values.title: Compassion
values.description: We approach our work with empathy and understanding for all stakeholders.

values.title: Equity
values.description: We ensure equal access to educational opportunities for all students.

values.title: Global Perspective
values.description: We incorporate international best practices while respecting local culture.

footer.title: Georgian Education Initiative
footer.description: Empowering education and fostering academic excellence across Georgia through innovative programs, research, and community engagement.
